documentation.text:
verify the transaction would execute.
 validate the signature and the nonce of the request.
 revert if either signature or nonce are incorrect.

attributes.text:
verify the transaction would execute.
 validate the signature and the nonce of the request.
 revert if either signature or nonce are incorrect.

params.domainSeparator: - domain used when signing this request
params.signature: - signature to validate. the transaction is verified, and then executed. the success and ret of "call" are returned. This method would revert only verification errors. target errors are reported using the returned "success" and ret string
params.suffixData: - the extension data used when signing this request.

verify(bytes32,bytes32,(address,address,.notice: verify the transaction would execute. validate the signature and the nonce of the request. revert if either signature or nonce are incorrect.
